# preferredPresentationStyle

**Instance Property**

The presentation style of the window scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var preferredPresentationStyle: UIWindowScene.PresentationStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

The presentation style determines how the system displays the new window scene relative to other scenes in the workspace. The default style is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIWindowScene/PresentationStyle/automatic].

## Deprecated

- **UIWindowSceneReplacePlacement**
